thread.title: Great Location & Design
thread.title_full: Great Location & Design - Review of Hotel Vernet, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Jerry W
title: Great Location & Design
text: The hotel is 1-min-walk away from the Arc de triomphe de l'Ã‰toile, and the famous L'Atelier De Joel Robuchon is right beside the hotel. The shower room is spacious. The staff were friendly and helpful. Room is modern with USB charger beside the bed. Most importantly, the price was reasonable for a 5-star hotel in Paris.
